description: Complete system overview explaining the RustyMail architecture, key components, and high-level data flows between IMAP client, MCP protocol layer, and multiple interface options (REST, SSE, stdio)
Detailed documentation of core IMAP data models including Email, Folder, Envelope, Address structures and their relationships, focusing on the custom implementations in src/imap/types.rs
Comprehensive documentation of the Model Context Protocol (MCP) implementation including message formats, error codes, supported methods, and state management across different transport types
Detailed documentation of core email operation algorithms including atomic move operations, folder synchronization, search implementations, and session state management from src/imap/session.rs
Documentation of the three interface implementations (REST, SSE, stdio) focusing on their unique handling of email operations, state management, and client communication patterns
